problem_text_cn: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线l1,l2分别交直线a,b,c于A,B,C和D,E,F,且\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DF=15,则DE=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight lines l1, and l2 intersect the straight lines a, b, and c respectively in A, B, C and D, E, F, and \frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{N_1}{N_2}, DF = N_3, then DE = ( )
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,灵活运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
